description:
The first 500 people to use my link https://skl.sh/forrestknight07241 will get a 1 month free trial of Skillshare premium!

Meta just released their latest “open source” AI model, Llama 3.1. Let's see if it's better than ChatGPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Shannon. But what's crazy is that Mark Zuckerberg has been the open source AI advocate and is on a huge redemption arc. Clearly due to the increase in ability of ZuckOS thanks to Llama 3.1. And if Zuck's change isn’t a testament to just how good Llama AI models are, then I don’t know what is.

If you're a developer, sign up to my free newsletter Dev Notes 👉 https://www.devnotesdaily.com/

If you're a student, checkout my Notion template Studious: https://notionstudent.com

Don't know why you'd want to follow me on other socials. I don't even post. But here you go.
🐱‍🚀 GitHub: https://github.com/forrestknight
🐦 Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/forrestpknight
💼 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/forrestpknight
📸 Instagram: https://www.instag
title: Zuck says "Open Source AI" is the Path Forward
